title: The Treasures of Suleiman
description: India Sommers and Brandon Walker find themselves drawn once more into an investigation of murder, history and intrigue. From the deserts of the sahara to the jungles of the Caribbean, their journey follows the clues left by a long dead Ottoman Admiral, ultimately leading to the most dangerous situation they have ever faced and the potential of the greatest treasure known to man.
author: K.M. Ashman
